Posts.Content: mrsd348 wrote: April 2006 I was diagnosed with endometrial cancer.  Stage 1b, grade 2.  Had surgery, internal radiation.  I am feeling fine except for incisional hernia which I will probably have repaired this year since I have met my deductable,  April 2008 diagnosed DCIS (low grade)  After lumpectomy 30 radiation treatments, now tamoxifen for five years.  I was concerned whether it was safe for me to take drug - oncologist says I should take it particularly since this is my second bout.  I am 59 with strong family history - mother, sister breast cancer, brother colon.  I'm worried that these little fires will keep showing up every couple of years now.  My oncologist said he knew a woman with five primarly cancers. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: second primary cancer mrsd348 LuAnnH
